item.description: 代理使用 # Docker配置代理 # /etc/systemd/system/docker.service.d [Service] Environment="HTTP_PROXY=http://x:x@172.22.43.127:10086" Environment="HTTPS_PROXY=http://x:x@172.22.43.127:10086" Environment="NO_PROXY=localhost,127.0.0.1,.cn" 重启服务 # sudo systemctl daemon-reload sudo systemctl restart docker

Docker相关 # FROM scratch #debian12.x --force-rm ADD rootfs.tar.xz / ENV TZ='CST-8' LANG='zh_CN.UTF-8' # 笔记本盒盖问题+apt清华源 # 安装openssh-server时要确认,使用echo管道 # 解决sshd时中文显示错误问题(apt安装语言包locales),bash下可以不用 # 中文汉化,通过find /etc -mtime -1找到dpkg-reconfigure locales的不同,确定是/etc/default/locale文件 # 添加docker用户不设密码 RUN echo "HandleLidSwitch=lock" >> /etc/systemd/logind.conf &&\ sed -i "s|deb.debian.org|mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn|g" /etc/apt/sources.list.d/debian.sources &&\ apt update &&\ echo 'y' | apt install -y bash-completion curl iproute2 iputils-ping locales net-tools openssh-server sudo vim-tiny wget &&\ mkdir /run/sshd &&\ apt clean &&\ echo "zh_CN.UTF-8 UTF-8" > /etc/locale.gen &&\ echo "LANG=zh_CN.
